REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM A f2770 reute r f AM-BRAZIL-STRIKES 03-26 0079

TEXT.TITLE: BRAZIL BANKWORKERS STRIKE ENTERS THIRD DAY
TEXT.BODY: A national strike by the majority of Brazil's 700,000 bankworkers completed three days and no negotiated solution was immediately expected, a spokesman for the National Federation of Banks said today. While bankworkers are demanding a 100 per cent pay rise, the private bankers would rather wait until next Monday, when a labour court is due to judge the legality of the stoppage, the spokesman said. Reuter
